meaningMnemonic: When under<radical>ground</radical> <radical>music</radical> makes it out into the light of the <radical>sun</radical> (the public), it finally becomes <kanji>official</kanji>. Music isn't really real unless people hear it outside of those secret underground concerts.
readingMnemonic: Once the music is <kanji>official</kanji>, you'll feel it in your <reading>sou</reading>l (そう). When you listen to it outside, under the bright sun, your soul gets to finally hear it too.
